start: I’ve been building banks on Indian burial grounds for decades, this place isn’t haunted, this is just some union scam!
This guy bulldozed my house and built this atrocity! He’s the reason I got into haunting, but he’s never in town.
Well, if you can reach him, revenge is yours.
Revenge? I just want to scare him. Maybe if I scare him, he’ll pack up the place and leave.
end: Just a bit, but I'm not done with him yet.
